t: Amazon.com: Chinashow
Amazon China - Wikipedia
s: 1 day ago - Amazon China (Chinese: 亚马逊中国), formerly known as Joyo.com (Chinese: 卓越网), is an online shopping website. Joyo.com was founded in early 2000 by the Chinese entrepreneur Lei Jun in Beijing, China. The company primarily sold books and other media goods, shipping to customers nationwide.

t: Chart: Made in China, Sold on Amazon | Statista
s: According to media reports, Amazon is now planning to launch its own low-cost offering. A presentation seen by CNBC reveals the new store will offer a range of unbranded products with prices expected to be under $20. Items cited include massage devices, fitness weights and cell phone cases.

s: The truth is that China has cloned Ford and Apple items. If those guys can't stop them how can we? I've been battling with someone else putting their brand name on my home made item for years now and Amazon could care less that someone hacked their system and put their brand on my item.
